column2: ggplot(new_data, aes(x = freq_MT, y = str)) + geom_raster(aes(fill = Predict_gam)) + facet_wrap(~facet) + scale_fill_gradient(low = "yellow", high = "red") + geom_density2d(data = myt2, n = 20)  + theme_bw() + labs(x = "Prevalence (proportion of M.trossulus)", y = "Structure", fill = "Вероятность \n встретить Т-морфотип")
